ん!?
あいつ 何やってるんだ

en_text: Stop! Stop!
jp_text: やめろ やめろ～！

en_text: Go!
jp_text: 行け～っ！

en_text: The yakuza boss lost some serious money,\N so he'll be looking for me.
jp_text:
今頃 大損したヤクザの親分が
俺を捜してる
google_translated:
There is a parent of Yakuza who lost this time
I'm looking for me

en_text: Where's Shiraishi?
jp_text: ん？　白石は？

en_text: Over there. Broken.
jp_text: あそこでぶっ壊れてる

en_text: He'll follow us.
jp_text: どうせ追ってくるだろう

en_text: I did it! I'm rich!
jp_text: やった～っ 大もうけだ～！

en_text: I was tricked by a fox.
jp_text: キツネに化かされた

en_text: Is this what you're looking for?
jp_text: 何が狙いだ？

en_text: I followed you here because I happened \Nto hear rumors about the tattoos.
jp_text:
入れ墨のうわさを偶然
耳にしたからなんだがね
google_translated:
Coincidence of tattoos
It's because I heard it

en_text: But when I saw you at the barber, I knew it was you.
jp_text: 床屋で見かけた時 すぐ分かった
google_translated: I understand that I saw it in a barber

en_text: I worked for Lt. Tsurumi, so I know you well.
jp_text:
あんたらのことは
よく知ってるぜ

en_text: Do you need a good bodyguard, \NHijikata Toshizou?
jp_text: 腕の立つ用心棒はいらねえかい？

en_text: Hey!
jp_text: てめえ 何も反省してねえな

en_text: Did you wake up from your dream, Scat King?
jp_text:
脱糞王
夢から覚めたか？
google_translated:
Feces
Did you wake up from a dream?

en_text: Yeah, I guess I had a bad dream.
jp_text: ああ～ 悪い夢を見ていたようだ
google_translated: Oh ~ I seem to have a bad dream

en_text: I've learned my lesson.
jp_text: 反省したよ

en_text: Interested in some special information?
jp_text:
とっておきの情報を
聞く気はねえか？
google_translated:
Easy information
Do you want to hear?

en_text: It had better not be as horrible as it usually is.
jp_text:
またろくでもない話じゃ
ねえだろうな
google_translated:
It is a story that is not even another
It will be hey

en_text: I heard this from a cutie in Susukino.
jp_text:
ススキノのかわい子ちゃんから
聞いた話では…
google_translated:
From the cute girl of Susukino
In the story I heard ...

en_text: A month ago, a man came to my hotel, alone.
jp_text: ひと月前 ホテルに１人の男が来た
google_translated: One man has come to the hotel for a while

en_text: He was a thief,
jp_text: その男は泥棒で

en_text: but when he snuck into a certain house,\Nhe saw something strange.
jp_text:
ある家に侵入した時
異常なものを見たそうだ
google_translated:
When it invaded a house
It seems that I saw something abnormal

en_text: There were taxidermied human \Nmounts made from corpses.
jp_text:
そこでは死体から
人間の剥製が作られていて
google_translated:
There, from the corpse
Human detachment is made

en_text: And he saw a skin with a strange \Ntattoo that wasn't a yakuza's.
jp_text: 奇妙な入れ墨の皮もあったと
google_translated: There was a strange tattoo skin

en_text: And that house is in Yuubari, she says.
jp_text: その家が夕張にあるんだと
google_translated: If the house is in Yubari

en_text: We don't know for sure that the \NAbashiri plan will work, right?
jp_text:
網走の計画だって
うまくいく保証はないんだからよ
google_translated:
It is the plan of Abashiri
There is no guarantee that works well

en_text: If we happen to get information on \Nthe prisoners or tattoos on our way,
jp_text:
道すがら囚人や刺青人皮の情報が
手に入るなら
google_translated:
Information of the way and tattooed tin
If you get it

en_text: I think it's worth checking out.
jp_text:
そこへ向かってみるべきだと
思うんだよな～
google_translated:
I should see it there
I think ~

en_text: Lt. Tsurumi has at least one...
jp_text:
鶴見中尉が少なくとも刺青人皮を
１枚持ってる
google_translated:
Nerondizumi Tsurumi is at least tattoo
I have one

en_text: Sergeant Tsukishima,
jp_text: 月島軍曹

en_text: keep your eyes on that grave.
jp_text: あの墓から目を離すな
google_translated: Don't let go of your eyes from that tomb

en_text: It was dug just after the accident \Nin the coal mines yesterday.
jp_text:
昨日の炭鉱事故で
土葬されたばかりの墓だ
google_translated:
Yesterday's coal mineral accident
It is a tomb that has just been buried

en_text: Do you think they'll take the bait?
jp_text:
はい
エサに食いつきますかね？

en_text: Word of a coal mine accident will \Nspread through Yuubari quickly.
jp_text:
炭鉱で事故があれば
あっという間に
google_translated:
If there is an accident on coal mine
before you could say Jack Robinson

en_text: I'm sure the grave robber will hear it, too.
jp_text:
分かった 分かった
私が死んだらくれてやる

en_text: What's wrong, Nikaidou?
jp_text: どうした 二階堂？

en_text: Can I have just your left ear?
jp_text: 鶴見中尉の左耳だけ頂けませんか？
google_translated: Could you only receive the left ear of Tsurumi Nakajima?

en_text: Really, Lt. Tsurumi?
jp_text:
ほんとですか？
鶴見中尉

en_text: Don't kill him, Nikaidou!
jp_text:
追え
殺すなよ 二階堂

en_text: Let's bring it to him.
jp_text: 届けてやろう
